column5: Hey has anyone heard Has Hooked magazine out of Winnipeg folded and closed its doors. If true to bad as It was a good one.
They still have their Facebook page up and have an ad about Fall Issue. BOB
Hooked is very much alive and well. I write an article in every issue. Great magazine for Central Canada.
What happened to Steve W??? No Longer Editor
Never heard of it!Is it available on newstands or online?
